title: PROJECT TITLE 1 — FULL-STACK WEB APPLICATION
description: A modern web application built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB featuring responsive design and real-time functionality.

title: PROJECT TITLE 2 — E-COMMERCE PLATFORM
description: Scalable e-commerce solution with payment integration, inventory management, and admin dashboard.

title: PROJECT TITLE 3 — MOBILE-FIRST WEB APP
description: Progressive web application optimized for mobile devices with offline functionality and push notifications.

title: PROJECT TITLE 4 — API DEVELOPMENT
description: RESTful API built with Node.js and Express, featuring authentication, data validation, and comprehensive documentation.

title: PROJECT TITLE 5 — CLOUD DEPLOYMENT
description: Containerized application deployment using Docker and AWS with CI/CD pipeline implementation.

title: PROJECT TITLE 6 — REACT DASHBOARD
description: Interactive dashboard built with React and D3.js for real-time data visualization and analytics.

title: PROJECT TITLE 7 — PORTFOLIO WEBSITE
description: Modern portfolio website with smooth animations, responsive design, and optimized performance.
